hibernate-mapping.query: from Genre g where g.status = 'A'
from Company c where c.status = 'A'
from CompanyCompetition cc where cc.status = 'A'
from QuizOptions op where op.quiz.quizSeq = :quizSeq and op.status = 'A'
select q.quizSeq from Quiz q where q.genre.genreCd = :genreCd and q.status = 'A' order by rand()
from Participant p where p.email = :email and p.status = 'A'
from CompetitionParticipant cp where cp.participant.email = :email and cp.competition.competitionSeq = :competitionSeq and cp.status = 'A'
from CompetitionParticipant cp where cp.token = :token and cp.status = 'A'
from CompanyCompetition cc where cc.refCode = :refCd and cc.status = 'A'
from CompanyCompetition cc where cc.company.companySeq = :companySeq and cc.competition.competitionSeq =:competitionSeq and cc.status = 'A'
select qo.quiz.quizSeq as quizSeq, qo.quizOptionsSeq as optionSeq from QuizOptions qo where qo.quiz.quizSeq = :quizSeq and qo.status = 'A' and qo.isCorrect = 'Y'
from CompanyDomain cd where cd.company.companySeq = :companySeq and cd.status = 'A'
from Quiz q where q.status = 'A'
from CompanyCompetition cc where cc.company.companySeq = :companySeq and cc.status = 'A'
from CompanyCompetition cc where cc.refCode = :refCode and cc.status = 'A'
select count(*) from CompetitionParticipant cp where cp.status = 'A' and cp.competition.competitionSeq = :competitionSeq and cp.companySeq = :companySeq

select sum(cp.score) as score, cp.participant.name as name from CompetitionParticipant cp where cp.participant.status = 'A' and cp.status = 'A' and cp.submitted = 'Y' and cp.companySeq = :companySeq group by cp.participant.participantSeq order by score desc

select cp.score as seq, cp.participant.name as name from CompetitionParticipant cp where cp.participant.status = 'A' and cp.status = 'A' and cp.submitted = 'Y' and cp.competition.competitionSeq = :competitionSeq and cp.companySeq = :companySeq order by cp.score desc, cp.timeTaken desc, cp.startTime asc
from UserToken ut where ut.userToken = :token
from UserProfileDetail up where up.userProfile.userProfileSeq = :userProfileSeq
